name: eWriter Book
summary: An EWRITER file is an eBook that can be read with EC Software eWriter Viewer. In addition to text content, an EWRITER file may contain videos, images, audio, and interactive elements. Thus, some EWRITER files contain presentations or games, rather than typical books.
